titles.title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to authorize programs of child abuse education and prevention, and to establish a demonstration project relating to child abuse education and prevention.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S11927-11928)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

bill.summary: 9/15/1993--Introduced. Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to direct the Secretary of Education to establish a demonstration program and fund other programs for child abuse education and prevention curriculum development and teacher training. Authorizes appropriations.
